descriptionPreview:
Problem Description:
I have a Repl that, given a specific Tweet ID, it will call the Twitter API and pull all replies and import them into a csv. However, I want to upgrade this script to be able to:

Pull all recent tweets of a twitter account if given a specific twitter handle
Import all the replies into the current replies.csv file (already made, just need to integrate this properly in the account loop)
Import all the usernames that retweeted the same tweets into retweets.csv

Acceptance Criteria:

The script now takes in a Twitter Handle as the main input and will pull tweets of the past day
The script will iterate through all these tweets and pull:
reply tweets and authors into replies.csv
retweeting accounts into retweets.csv
Bonus: You schedule the repl to run daily
title: Twitter Replies Script

descriptionPreview:
Make aitools.fyi go viral!

Post a video/short on TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and/or Snapchat about how amazing aitools.fyi is(or an informative video) and get over 100K views and get the bounty!

Please note: North American based audience is preferred for this bounty.

Acceptance Criteria
You have to share analytics of the video and the actual video link. The video has to clearly mention aitools.fyi. The website address aitools.fyi (https://aitools.fyi for YouTube) should be in the description of the video.

Note: You can upload multiple videos if you like but to get the bounty, one video has to get 100K+ views.
title: Make aitools.fyi go viral with 100K+ views!

descriptionPreview:
Problem Description

I have an MVP app, that is a react frontend built on top of Airtable (and using Softr to manage login and auth.)

The app has public facing user-profiles. I need to add a button on those public-facing profiles. That's it, literally just a button.

Acceptance Criteria

I need someone who can quickly implement this, and can take general guidance and turn it into final components. Opportunity for more projects if interested.

Link to Project
Can provide link and details to the person chosen to complete the bounty
title: Add a button to a custom react app built on top of Airtable

descriptionPreview:
Problem Description
Clone OpenAI playground and examples pages and functionality.
Free to change theme or use similar theme
Playground (include working submit, load preset search list) (dont include model filters, can use defaults)
Examples (don't need to clone all examples only ten I will provide later)
Examples Popup (include popup screen that allows you to view example and option to open in playground)
Google signin

Acceptance Criteria
front and backend
must work on shared hosting
title: Clone OpenAI Playground & Examples (with Login)

descriptionPreview:
Problem Description
The application here: https://github.com/sirkevinwang/Blink uses a significant amount of CPU and memory to take video and to run image processing on that video. Make an app that either 1) offloads the image processing to a user's EC2 box or 2) schedules it to happen using the M1 chip's hardware acceleration for videos/the Mac M1's graphics unit.

You should benchmark average CPU, graphics card, and memory usage of the current app, and the benchmarks for your fixed version of the app.

Acceptance Criteria
I will only accept applications that 1) have either a Github or a resume/portfolio attached and 2) mention either past experience or a specific plan to make the changes.

Technical Details
I will pay this amount only if the application is made at least 50% more battery efficient.

Link to Project
https://github.com/sirkevinwang/Blink
title: Make Mac Video App More Efficient (via s3 or Mac M1 chip acceleration)
